tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_network_changes (
  change_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  change_type VARCHAR(50),
  change_description TEXT,
  change_date TIMESTAMP,
  upgrade_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (upgrade_id) REFERENCES blockchain_network_upgrades(upgrade_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_changes (
  change_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  change_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  change_description TEXT,
  upgrade_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (upgrade_id) REFERENCES blockchain_upgrades(upgrade_id)
);

CREATE TABLE upgrade_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  log_details TEXT,
  change_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (change_id) REFERENCES network_changes(change_id)
);

CREATE TABLE change_details (
    change_detail_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    change_id UUID,
    detail_id UUID,
    affected_entity VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (change_id) REFERENCES network_changes(change_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (detail_id) REFERENCES upgrade_details(detail_id)
);
